description:
Our Cloud Capability team, part of our Technology Solutions Practice, is a group of dedicated cloud-native experts helping our clients get the most from their cloud investments. Our offerings range from cloud-native application architecture and development to cloud migrations, to strategic advising and planning. We build best-in-class cloud environments, architectures, and applications for our clients.

As an Architect in our cloud capability group, you will lead cross-functional consulting teams (typically 3-8) in designing and implementing cloud-native solutions for your clients. As a leader you will be the point person who ensures our solutions align with best practices, and deliver in our value proposition to our clients.

WHO YOU ARE:
• You have at least 5 years of hands-on experience delivering cloud enterprise solutions across multiple domains in industry or technology consulting. You spend at least 40% of your time actively building cloud native solutions.
• You have a deep understanding of cloud solution architecture in one or more major cloud service providers (e.g., Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud Platform, and Microsoft Azure)
• You have a passion for technology breadth and keep yourself up to date on the latest application and cloud development trends across all software development disciplines and processes.
• You are accomplished at mentoring, leading, and developing others. You currently lead teams that develop complex, high-volume, mission critical enterprise solutions that are built in the cloud from day one.
• You have effective communication and interpersonal skills, and the ability to engage with customers about their business, as well as their technology. You can handle complex organizational dynamics to deliver solutions to a client’s satisfaction.

This position is open to any of our client's office locations: Dallas, Denver, Houston, Seattle, Atlanta, Los Angeles and New York City.
